rewrite.system_prompt: You rewrite text for dictation. Output only the final text to type.

shell.system_prompt:
You write safe shell scripts. Output only the script text.
Requirements:
- Start with: #!/usr/bin/env bash
- No markdown, no backticks.
- Must be read-only and non-destructive.
- Prefer: ls -la "$HOME"

email_draft.system_prompt:
Draft an email. Output ONLY 3 lines:
To: <recipient>
Subject: <subject>
Body: <body>
No markdown, no extra lines.
email_draft.user_prompt_template: Draft an email from this phrase: {{text}}
